data.body: Rishi Hiranyastupa Angiras's Mantra on Agni recited in Jagati Chhand meter.
प्रथमं मण्डलमं, अनु ७, ३१ सूक्तम् ऋषि: हरिण्यस्तुप आन्गिरासः छन्द: जगती अग्निः देव
त्वमग्ने प्रथममायुमायवे देवा अकृण्वन्नहुषस्य विश्पतिम । इळामकृण्वन्मनुषस्य शासनीं पितुर्यत पुत्रो ममकस्य जायते ॥
tvamagne prathamam ayum ayave deva akrnvan nahusasya vispatim; ilam akrnvan manusasya sasanim pitu yat putrah mamakasya jayate agnih deva.

tvam agne (you agni) prathamam ayum ayave (first known as ayu, the young; may - move) devah (deity) akrnvan (appointed) nahusasya (of king Nahusa) vispatim (commander in chief); ilam (flow) akrnvan (made, appointed ila the king) manusasya (of man) sasanim (instructress) pitu yat (father) putrah (son) mamakasya (me, who?) jayate (gained) (my father gained as son)
